This software was developed for the needs of the Pôle de Ressources et
d'Assistance pour les Technologies de l'Information et de la Communication
(PRATIC) de l'École Normale Supérieure de Lyon (ENS Lyon).
         
This software is part of the architecture of the Learning Content
Management System of the ENS Lyon. It is used to connect the central
Learning Object Metadata XML collection to various ressource publishing
sites ( http://planetterre.ens-lyon.fr, http://csphysique.ens-lyon.fr).
      
         
Team :
	          
 Gerard Vidal : director (lead stress)
 Sebastien Chaumat : IT manager, original idea, programmer stressing :)
 Sebastien Pilloz : IT ingeneer, project manager and stressed programmer
        
 We wish to thanks Wolfgang Meyer for making eXist available to the
 community.
